welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Campbell River, Canada! Get ready to experience the charm of our coastal town, known for its stunning scenery and adventurous spirit. We invite you to explore and embrace all that Campbell River has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Campbell River Airport serves domestic flights within Canada.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mansons Landing SPB Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Mansons Landing SPB Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal at Courtenay Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Comox Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The south terminal at Comox Airport is dedicated to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
